description: APIServerDeploymentConfiguration contains certain configurations for the deployment of the Gardener Extension API server

hvpa.description: Hvpa contains configurations for the HVPA of the Gardener Extension API server Please note that VPA has to be disabled in order to use HVPA

livenessProbe.description:
LivenessProbe allows to overwrite the default liveness probe Defaults:
 initialDelaySeconds: 15
 periodSeconds: 10
 successThreshold: 1
 failureThreshold: 3
 timeoutSeconds: 15

minReadySeconds.description: MinReadySeconds allows to overwrite the default minReadySeconds field Defaults to 30

podAnnotations.description: PodAnnotations are additional annotations on the pods.

podLabels.description: PodLabels are additional labels on the pods.

readinessProbe.description:
LivenessProbe allows to overwrite the default readiness probe Defaults:
 initialDelaySeconds: 15
 periodSeconds: 10
 successThreshold: 1
 failureThreshold: 3
 timeoutSeconds: 15

replicaCount.description: ReplicaCount is the number of replicas. Default: 1.

resources.description: Resources are compute resources required by the container.

serviceAccountName.description: ServiceAccountName is the name of the ServiceAccount to create and mount into the pod.

vpa.description: VPA specifies whether to enable VPA for the deployment. Default: false.
